project.name: Memory Parasite Protocol
project.description: An experiment in AI agent symbiosis/parasitism: 5 autonomous AI agents injecting suggestions into each other contextual windows as they build Solana protocols. Every infection is recorded on-chain, creating a transparent audit trail of cross-agent influence (Chimerism).
project.solanaIntegration: Uses AgentWallet for secure, compliant on-chain identity (F3qZ46mPC5BTpzMRRh6gixF9dp7X3D35Ug8os5p8SPqq). Records infection proofs and chimerism metrics on Solana devnet using AgentWallet managed keys to ensure persistent, recoverable identity and verifiable agent interactions.
